original_text:
For all nations have drunk
    the wine of the passion of her sexual immorality,
and the kings of the earth have committed immorality with her,
    and the merchants of the earth have grown rich from the power of her luxurious living.”
korean_text: 그 음행의 진노의 포도주로 말미암아 만국이 무너졌으며 또 땅의 왕들이 그와 더불어 음행하였으며 땅의 상인들도 그 사치의 세력으로 치부하였도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: the wine of the passion of her sexual immorality
and the kings of the earth have committed immorality with her
and the merchants of the earth have grown rich
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 상인들도 그녀로 인해 부자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: from the power of her luxurious living
